Legacy Blog Platform

Overview:
A simple blog platform where users can create, edit, and publish blog posts.

Core Features:
1. User registration and authentication
2. Create and edit blog posts
3. Publish and unpublish posts
4. Comment system for readers
5. Basic admin panel

Technical Requirements:
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- Database: MongoDB
- Frontend: React
- Authentication: JWT tokens

User Stories:
- As a blogger, I want to write posts so I can share my thoughts
- As a reader, I want to comment on posts so I can engage with content
- As an admin, I want to moderate content so I can maintain quality

Implementation Steps:
1. Set up project structure
2. Create user authentication system
3. Build post creation interface
4. Implement comment functionality
5. Add admin features
6. Deploy to production
